meanings.definition: The sequence of steps and movements in dance or figure skating.
meanings.sent1: The choreographies in the ballet were graceful and elegant.
meanings.sent2: She studied the choreographies for the ice skating competition.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's choreographies on the ice made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her choreographies were like a carefully crafted painting coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The choreographies of the dancers painted a beautiful story on stage.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of events or actions in a coordinated manner.
meanings.sent1: The choreographies of the event were meticulously planned.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together to perfect the choreographies of the project.
meanings.sent3: The choreographies of the party made sure everyone had a good time.
meanings.sent4: His choreographies of the business meetings were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The choreographies of the plan ensured everything ran smoothly.
